intro: Alafia perrieri var. perrieri, commonly known as the Perrier's alafia, is a species of flowering plant native to Madagascar. It belongs to the family Commelinaceae and is characterized by its slender, grass-like appearance with narrow, linear leaves. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a rare and potentially endangered species.
